primary.context: Returning a call from a specific representative regarding a payment
primary.detail: The AI attempted to send a payment link but encountered a technical issue and transferred the caller to concierge.

steps: Agent attempted to identify the caller and the reason for the call.
Caller explained they were returning a call about paying maintenance fees.
Agent performed account lookup and verified last name and state.
Agent confirmed contact information for the payment link.
Agent encountered a technical error while sending the link and initiated a transfer.

failure.detail: The agent reported an issue while sending the payment information, necessitating a transfer.

clarifications.note: Repeated request for last name after user said 'What?'

actions.detail: Verified last name Watts and state Virginia
Transferred to concierge after link failure

insights.summary: The caller wanted to pay maintenance fees after receiving a call earlier. The AI verified the account but failed to send the payment link due to a technical error, resulting in a transfer to concierge.
insights.verbatim: I was returning a call. About paying it at maintenance to tax.
insights.coaching: The agent handled the transition from a transfer request to a self-service flow well, but the technical failure at the final step forced the transfer anyway.
